sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_cls_idea">
    <x_snc_cls_idea action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>false</active>
        <description>Example: triggering a processor</description>
        <episode display_value="NOWCommunity Live Stream - 2019-04-29">3dc362aedb41fb00f6d0a422ca9619f1</episode>
        <name>Getting a sys_id from the URL in a client script</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function callExportJeopardyGame() {
	var url = new GlideURL('export_jeopardy_game.do');
	url.addParam('sysparm_sys_id', g_form.getUniqueValue());
	var frame = top.gsft_main;
	if (!frame){
		frame = top;
	}
	
	frame.location = url.getURL();
}]]></script>
        <sys_created_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-04-28 18:34:37</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>f766ded2dbc5bb00f6d0a422ca961921</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-04-30 12:03:30</sys_updated_on>
    </x_snc_cls_idea>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Getting a sys_id from the URL in a client script
